means: 不友好的，不礼貌的，简慢的

sentence.Network_en: "Were they at home or away, do you know offhand?"
sentence.Network_cn: “他们在家还是出去了，你能现在告诉我吗？”

sentence.Network_en: He was very offhand with me.
I can't tell offhand how much it will cost.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不能立刻告诉你它值多少钱.

常用英语短语-网络中国翻译 ... off the track 离题 offhand 毫无准备;即席 Oh yeah? 真的吗.
张红岩TOEFL ... offer n.v. 提议，提出 offhand adj. 临时的，无准备的 offspring n. 子孙，后代.
下篇雅思考试突破高分词汇 - 豆丁网 ... casual 不经心的不在意的 offhand 随便的 6.法律与秩序 statute 法规.

list.abs: offhand comments could not be disclaimed and they could no longer alter speeches for local consumption .即兴评论无法抵赖，而且，再也不能为了本地销量而更改讲话。
Her clothes usually gave an offhand effect ., 她的衣服通常给人以一种不拘礼节的感觉.
using whirlwind while dual wielding now deals damage from both mainhand and offhand weapons .双持时使用旋风现在主手和副手武器都能产生伤害。
I dislike the young man ' s offhand manner ., 我不喜欢这年轻人粗鲁的态度.
the offhand manner does tend to put people off ., 随便态度易使人反感.

entry.tran: 不友好的；不礼貌的；漫不经心的
entry.def: If you say that someone is being offhand, you are critical of them for being unfriendly or impolite, and not showing any interest in what other people are doing or saying.

example.ex: He lapsed into long silences or became offensively off-hand...
example.tran: 他要么陷入长时间的沉默，要么变得简慢无礼。

example.ex: Consumers found the attitude of its staff offhand and generally offensive to the paying customer.
example.tran: 消费者认为其职员的态度漫不经心，对付款的顾客通常表现得令人反感。

entry.tran: 未经核实地；不加思索地；立刻；即席地
entry.def: If you say something offhand, you say it without checking the details or facts of it.

example.ex: 'Have you done the repairs?'  — 'Can't say off-hand, but I doubt it.'...
example.tran: “你们修理了吗？”——“一时说不清楚，但是我想还没有。”

example.ex: 'Were they at home or away, do you know offhand?'
example.tran: “他们在家还是出去了，你能现在告诉我吗？”

means.word_mean: 1. with little or no preparation or forethought;

sentences.sentence: "she treated most men with offhand contempt"
"we decided offhand to go to Canada"
"replied offhand, his mind a million miles away"
"she threw him over offhandedly without even a Dear-John letter"

means.word_mean: 不友好的;不礼貌的;简慢的

sentences.en: I can’t answer your request offhand.
sentences.cn: 我不能随便答复你的要求。
